title: Fuel will NOT be distributed today (15)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Chairman of the Ceylon Petroleum Storage Terminals Ltd. says that fuel will NOT be distributed to filling stations today (15).
Chairman Major General R.M.W. Zoysa stated that all employees have been given leave due to the Vesak Poya Day.
Meanwhile, long queues were seen near filling stations to get fuel from this morning, and a group is currently engaged in protests in Hambantota demanding fuel.
True goal should be to reach desired target without deviating: President
